server.authenticatedUser: The authenticated user is not allowed to access the specified API endpoint!
server.connectionTimeOut: Connection timed out. Try again or later!
server.invalidMethod: Method not allowed. Please check the Allow header for the allowed HTTP methods!
server.receiveTimeOut: Receiving timeout occurred. Try again or later!
server.redirectionFurtherActionNeeds: Redirection: further action needs to be taken in order to complete the request!
server.requestCancelled: Request to the server was cancelled!
server.sendTimeOut: Request send timeout. Try again or later!
server.serverError: Internal server error. Please contact admin!
server.socketException: Request failed. Make sure your connection has internet access!
server.unsupportedMediaType: Unsupported media type. The requested content type or version number is invalid!
server.urlNotFound: The requested resource does not exist!

failure.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please log in again!
failure.somethingWrongTryAgain: Something went wrong. Please try again later!
